casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Thomas STEELE Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017 James B. Streeto, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn.App. 1 , 169 A.3d 797 (2017), is denied.

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
